game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the Forgotten Tomb.
game.description: Archaeologist Dr. Liam has asked you to retrieve a precious artifact from the Cursed Tomb. It won't be easy, as the tomb is filled with traps and undead guardians. Be careful!

task.description: Find the exact location of the Forgotten Tomb following the map provided by Dr. Liam.
Overcoming various traps and defeating the undead guardians to proceed further into the tomb.
The artifact is likely to be placed in a special chamber inside the tomb. Find it and bring it back to Dr. Liam.
task.location: Ancient Chamber inside the Forgotten Tomb
